author: Janet French
title: Alberta may circumvent Health Canada to gain access to COVID-19 tests and drugs, premier says
description: Albertans should have access to COVID-19 tests, medicines and vaccines approved by trusted regulators in other countries, Premier Jason Kenney says.
content:
Albertans should have access to COVID-19 tests, medicines and vaccines approved by trusted regulators in other countries, Premier Jason Kenney says.
On Monday, Kenney said products approved by European or American health regulators should be available for us… [+5122 chars]
